dependency-updates.description: Ensure all dependencies are updated to their latest compatible versions

update-single-dependency.description: Update a single dependency and test changes.

inspect-dependency-tree.description: Inspect the dependency tree for issues or outdated packages.

pre-commit-check.description: Run dependency audits, peer dependency checks, and tests before committing changes.
pre-commit-check.command: pnpm audit && pnpm explain peer-dependencies && pnpm test

post-commit-rollback.description: Revert the last commit if a dependency issue arises.

schedule-daily-updates.description: Automatically update dependencies once every 24 hours.
schedule-daily-updates.command: pnpm update --latest && pnpm dedupe && pnpm audit
